title: Rent to Own in Warren. 4 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: Don't miss your chance to lease this sought-after Colonial-style home in warren.
There is space for the whole family with four bedrooms, a formal dining room, a living room, and a family room.
Close to GM tech center, minutes from I-696 Freeway.
For  Details & Pics Of This Property***
Brought to you by Lori Anderson at RE/MAX Classic - Farmington Hills
